meanings.sent1: The maturing tree bore delicious fruits.
meanings.sent2: The puppy is maturing into a strong dog.
meanings.sent3: The maturing student finally understood algebra.
meanings.sent4: Her maturing skills in painting were evident in her latest masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The maturing process of a caterpillar turning into a butterfly is fascinating.

meanings.definition: Becoming fully developed in body and mind.
meanings.sent1: His maturing mind grasped complex concepts easily.
meanings.sent2: The maturing athlete trained hard to improve.
meanings.sent3: The maturing brain needs proper nutrition to function well.
meanings.sent4: The maturing oak tree stood tall and strong in the forest.
meanings.sent5: Her maturing personality showed kindness and empathy towards others.

meanings.sent1: The maturing cheese had a rich and sharp taste.
meanings.sent2: The maturing grapes were ready to be harvested for wine.
meanings.sent3: The maturing apple tree bore sweet and juicy fruits.
meanings.sent4: The maturing wine had a deep and complex aroma.
meanings.sent5: The maturing flavors of the stew blended perfectly together.

meanings.definition: Showing signs of aging or improvement over time.
meanings.sent1: His maturing skills in woodworking impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The maturing building now stood as a symbol of history.
meanings.sent3: The maturing technology became more efficient with each update.
meanings.sent4: The maturing friendship between them grew stronger over the years.
meanings.sent5: The maturing city skyline changed with each new skyscraper.
